readable.title: 1312954382_cf6d70d63a
readable.content: A girl in a green dress plays with a Hello Kitty balloon . A girl wearing a green and orange dress walks on the street with a balloon . A little girl in an elaborate green and orange dress is chasing after a pink and white balloon figure . A little girl on the street in a yellowish green and orange dress is holding a Hello Kitty balloon with her right hand . The girl is wearing a green dress and holding a hello kitty balloon .
